item.title: Mexico Pitches Automakers GM, Toyota on Developing Southern States
item.description: Mexico Pitches Automakers GM, Toyota on Developing Southern States Mexico is in talks with General Motors (GM) and Toyota Motor Corporation (TMC) about investing in a narrow strip of land in southern Mexico. The government is hoping to attract investment to the region, which has been lagging behind the rest of the country in terms of economic development.
